mc.name: Hollow Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Hollow Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {X}. If you do, that player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Hollow Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {X}. If you do, that player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

mc.name: Cephalid Pathmage
mc.oracleText:
Cephalid Pathmage is unblockable.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText:
Cephalid Pathmage is unblockable.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.

mc.name: Covert Operative
mc.oracleText: Covert Operative is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Covert Operative is unblockable.
mc.flavorText: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.

mc.name: Feral Throwback
mc.oracleText:
Amplify 2 (As this card comes into play, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
mc.printedText:
Amplify 2 (As this card comes into play, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

mc.name: Deathmark Prelate

mc.printedText: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.flavorText: Death is a secret he is willing to share.

mc.name: Wirewood Channeler
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves in play.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves in play.
mc.flavorText: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

mc.name: Keeneye Aven
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

Trample

mc.printedText:
Trample
Morph {G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.printedText: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

mc.name: Defiant Elf
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: "I lost one home when Yavimaya was destroyed. I will not lose another."

mc.printedText: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
mc.flavorText: Those who lead others to wisdom become the wisest themselves.

mc.name: Brood Sliver
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

mc.name: Goblin Goon
mc.oracleText:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
mc.printedText:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
mc.flavorText: Giant-sized body. Goblin-sized brain.

mc.name: Riptide Mangler
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's power to target creature's power. (It doesn't change back at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's power to target creature's power. (It doesn't change back at end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: It wants you to be its chum.

mc.name: Phage the Untouchable
mc.oracleText:
When Phage the Untouchable comes into play, if you didn't play it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.
mc.printedText:
When Phage the Untouchable comes into play, if you didn't play it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

mc.name: Blade Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.
mc.printedText: All Slivers get +1/+0.
mc.flavorText: After breaking free from the Riptide Project, the slivers quickly adapted to life on Otaria--much to the dismay of life on Otaria.

mc.name: Plated Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
mc.printedText: All Slivers get +0/+1.
mc.flavorText: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

mc.name: Essence Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have lifelink. (Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gain that much life.)
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
mc.flavorText: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

mc.name: Synapse Sliver
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."
--Riptide Project researcher

mc.name: Frenetic Raptor
mc.oracleText: Beasts can't block.
mc.printedText: Beasts can't block.
mc.flavorText:
"How do you stop a raptor from charging? No, seriously Help"
--Blarg, goblin jester

mc.name: Quick Sliver
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Any player may play Sliver cards as though they had flash.
mc.printedText:
You may play Quick Sliver any time you could play an instant.
Any player may play Sliver cards any time he or she could play an instant.
mc.flavorText: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

mc.name: Crypt Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
mc.printedText: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
mc.flavorText:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
--Riptide Project researcher

mc.name: Mistform Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
mc.printedText: All Slivers have "{1}: This creature's type becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
mc.flavorText: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.

mc.name: Toxin Sliver
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: It doesn't need to use its venom--it just needs you to know it can.

mc.name: Needleshot Gourna
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Needleshot Gourna may block as though it had flying.
mc.flavorText: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.

mc.name: Magma Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers in play."
mc.printedText: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers in play."
mc.flavorText: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

mc.oracleText: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to play.

mc.flavorText: "It is not yet time."

mc.name: Dark Supplicant
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it into play. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it into play. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

mc.name: Shifting Sliver
mc.oracleText: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.
mc.printedText: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.
mc.flavorText: Once the last few slivers the Riptide Project controlled were dead, there was nothing to keep the island from being completely overrun.

mc.name: Skirk Outrider
mc.oracleText: Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as you control a Beast.
mc.printedText: Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as you control a Beast.
mc.flavorText: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.

mc.name: Elvish Soultiller
mc.oracleText: When Elvish Soultiller is put into a graveyard from play, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: When Elvish Soultiller is put into a graveyard from play, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText: Mutated elves wondered if this was their final form, or if it was just another step.

mc.name: Fugitive Wizard
mc.flavorText: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.

mc.oracleText:

Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
First strike, haste
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

mc.name: Aven Redeemer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.flavorText: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

mc.name: Flamewave Invoker
mc.oracleText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari burns in his heart.

mc.oracleText: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

mc.name: Seedborn Muse
mc.oracleText: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
mc.printedText: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is wilderness, savage and pure."
--Kamahl, druid acolyte

mc.oracleText: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari festers in its flesh.

mc.printedText: Amplify 1 (As this card comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
mc.flavorText: A herd of one.

Amplify 1 (As this card comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

Amplify 1 (As this card comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)

mc.name: Gempalm Avenger

When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)

mc.name: Starlight Invoker
mc.oracleText: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
mc.printedText: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari glows in her eyes.

mc.name: Wirewood Hivemaster
mc.oracleText: Whenever another nontoken Elf comes into play, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever another nontoken Elf comes into play, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."

mc.name: Glintwing Invoker

mc.printedText: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari flares in his mind.

mc.name: Blood Celebrant
mc.oracleText: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."
--Phage the Untouchable

Flying
Morph {3}{B} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
mc.printedText:
Flying

mc.name: White Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
mc.printedText: First strike, protection from black
mc.flavorText: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.

mc.name: Root Sliver
mc.oracleText:
Root Sliver can't be countered.
Sliver spells can't be countered by spells or abilities.
mc.printedText:
Root Sliver can't be countered.
Sliver spells can't be countered.
mc.flavorText:
"It would take another apocalypse to stop the slivers now."
--Riptide Project researcher

mc.name: Warped Researcher
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying and shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying until end of turn and can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
mc.flavorText: New insights yield new senses.

mc.name: Noxious Ghoul
mc.oracleText: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie comes into play, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie comes into play, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

mc.name: Spectral Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
mc.printedText: All Slivers have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
mc.flavorText:
"Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."
--Apprentice researcher

mc.name: Corpse Harvester
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Shaleskin Plower
mc.oracleText:
Morph {4}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.
mc.printedText:
Morph {4}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.

mc.name: Goblin Firebug
mc.oracleText: When Goblin Firebug leaves play, sacrifice a land.
mc.printedText: When Goblin Firebug leaves play, sacrifice a land.
mc.flavorText: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.

mc.name: Goblin Turncoat
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
mc.flavorText:
"Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."
--Phage the Untouchable

mc.name: Ward Sliver
mc.oracleText:
As Ward Sliver comes into play, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
mc.printedText:
As Ward Sliver comes into play, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
mc.flavorText: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

mc.name: Havoc Demon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Havoc Demon is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Havoc Demon is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.name: Skirk Alarmist

Haste
{T}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up. At end of turn, sacrifice it.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{T}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up. At end of turn, sacrifice it.
mc.flavorText: "I treat each day as your last."

mc.name: Dripping Dead
mc.oracleText:
Dripping Dead can't block.
Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
Dripping Dead can't block.
Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: It oozes death from every pore.

mc.name: Goblin Clearcutter
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a forest: Add three mana in any combination of red and/or green to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
"Did you know that wood burns even better than rocks?"
--Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

mc.name: Planar Guide
mc.oracleText: {3}{W}, Remove Planar Guide from the game: Remove all creatures from the game. At end of turn, return those cards to play under their owners' control.
mc.printedText: {3}{W}, Remove Planar Guide from the game: Remove all creatures from the game. At end of turn, return those cards to play under their owners' control.
mc.flavorText: "Every moment has its own savior."

mc.name: Wall of Hope
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
mc.flavorText:
"What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"
--Daru riddle

mc.name: Aven Envoy
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

mc.name: Vexing Beetle
mc.oracleText:
Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
mc.printedText:
Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
mc.flavorText: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled--but insects swarmed closer.

Morph {W}{W} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.name: Berserk Murlodont
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.flavorText:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."
--Aven scout

mc.name: Unstable Hulk
mc.oracleText:
Morph {3}{R}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.printedText:

Morph {3}{B} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.name: Drinker of Sorrow
mc.oracleText:
Drinker of Sorrow can't block.
Whenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.
mc.printedText:
Drinker of Sorrow can't block.
Whenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.
mc.flavorText: It strikes at your soul, heedless of your prayers.

mc.name: Bane of the Living
mc.oracleText:
Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

mc.name: Beacon of Destiny
mc.oracleText: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
mc.flavorText: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

mc.name: Enormous Baloth
mc.flavorText: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

mc.name: Merchant of Secrets
mc.oracleText: When Merchant of Secrets comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText: When Merchant of Secrets comes into play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or--if they get desperate enough--the truth.

mc.name: Daru Sanctifier
mc.oracleText:
Morph {1}{W} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.
mc.printedText:
Morph {1}{W} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

mc.oracleText:
Flying
Morph {6}{R}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Morph {6}{R}{R} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "You cannot fight the storm."

mc.name: Goblin Assassin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Assassin or another Goblin comes into play, each player flips a coin. Each player whose coin comes up tails sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: Whenever Goblin Assassin or another Goblin comes into play, each player flips a coin. Each player whose coin comes up tails sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText: The more victims he kills, the more likely he is to get the right one.

mc.name: Akroma's Devoted
mc.oracleText: Cleric creatures have vigilance.
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Clerics to tap.
mc.flavorText: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.

mc.name: Hunter Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Sliver creatures have provoke. (When a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
mc.printedText: All Slivers have provoke. (When a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
mc.flavorText: Once they get the scent, there is no escape.

mc.name: Windborn Muse
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature attacking you. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."
--Akroma, angelic avenger

mc.name: Dreamborn Muse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards from his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is insight, piercing and true."
--Ixidor, reality sculptor

mc.name: Graveborn Muse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."
--Phage the Untouchable

mc.name: Lavaborn Muse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText:
"Her voice is disaster, painful and final."
--Matoc, lavamancer

mc.name: Timberwatch Elf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves in play.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves in play.
mc.flavorText: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

mc.name: Whipgrass Entangler
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric in play."
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric in play. (This cost is paid as attackers or blockers are declared.)"
mc.flavorText: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

mc.name: Goblin Lookout
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: All Goblins get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Throw rocks at 'em Throw spears at 'em Throw Furt at 'em"

mc.name: Totem Speaker
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Beast comes into play, you may gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a Beast comes into play, you may gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."

mc.name: Goblin Grappler
mc.oracleText: Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
mc.printedText: Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
mc.flavorText: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.

Haste

mc.oracleText: Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying as long as you control a Bird.
mc.printedText: Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying as long as you control a Bird.
mc.flavorText: "It's easy to lose sight of hope until you gaze out from my vantage point."

mc.name: Mistform Ultimus
mc.oracleText: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't in play).
mc.printedText:
Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't in play).
Mistform Ultimus may attack as though it weren't a Wall.
mc.flavorText: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

mc.name: Canopy Crawler
mc.oracleText:
Amplify 1 (As this card comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.
mc.printedText:
Amplify 1 (As this card comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.

mc.name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
mc.oracleText: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "I order you to volunteer."

mc.name: Withered Wretch
mc.oracleText: {1}: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: {1}: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.
